com.sun.faces.application.view

Class ViewScopeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.faces.application.view.ViewScopeManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, FacesListener, SystemEventListener, ViewMapListener, javax.servlet.http.HttpSessionListener

    public class ViewScopeManager
extends Object
implements javax.servlet.http.HttpSessionListener, ViewMapListener
    The manager that deals with non-CDI and CDI ViewScoped beans.
